example.text: Mr. Johnson 's election as a director

example.name: autogen2
example.text: Despite many doubts about his candidacy , white New Yorkers -- who gave Mr. Dinkins 30 % of their votes in the primary -- are n't expected to desert in sufficient numbers to turn the election to Mr. Giuliani .
